summary: A collection of low‑level statistical utilities supporting bias correction and downscaling of climate data, including empirical distribution calculations, quantile interpolation, mapping between distributions, handling of cyclic day‑of‑year data, array broadcasting, and retrieval of correction factors.
business_intent: Enable climate model post‑processing workflows that adjust and downscale simulated variables to match observed statistical properties, improving the reliability of climate projections for impact assessments.
